_header: The city is bound that should be free
_description: Rude verses on injustices in Coventry (1496) attached to a church door — twelve couplets

CovLeet.First Lines:
This Cyte is bond that shuld be freThe right is holden fro þe
                    Communialte…
CovLeet.Last Lines:
…One may here be anoþer þat he shall not fyndebut ye
                    shall here of sum oþer what shalbe þe ende
